Pelagos Gipsy Trailer

  • Home
  • Rooms
  • Pelagos

The "Pelagos" Gipsy Trailer with Finnish Sauna

Have a rare and unique experience! Our Gipsy trailer is a true wooden cocoon surrounded by the scent of pine trees and eucalyptus, in a peaceful setting with a sea view. It is perfect to enjoy a pure moment of rest and timeless relaxation. For 2 guests.

Our 14 sqm (150 sq feet) air-conditioned gypsy trailer has a porch with a table and chairs and is situated 20 meters down the Villa. You will have access to the swimming pool and the terrace with natural wood stairs. Warning, steps can be dodgy and steep.

This trailer is full of surprises! It has been equipped with a Finnish sauna, a shower and a sink, a mini fridge and a courtesy tray for hot drinks.

It is equipped with air-conditioning.

The trailer features a Double bed (140x190 cm) with a 100 % organic mattress

Toilets are available outside the trailer.

Breakfast will be served at the Villa Thalassa terrace or dining room.

In order for you to travel light, we also provide pool towels.

You will enjoy Free WI-FI access in the trailer.

This Gipsy trailer is a non-smoking room.

Amenities

Air-Conditioning
Free Wi-Fi
Outdoor kitchen
Swimming Pool
Sea View
Landscaped Garden
from 190€/per night
  • Capacity: 2 Adults
  • Size: 39m²
